name: Mans BEST Friend (thigadoodal2)
description:
The game was made for the Gdevelop game jam 2! 

I had a lot of fun making it.

Almost ran out of time, took around 4 days to make. Hope you like it.

Liluo link:  https://liluo.io/thigadoodal/mans-best-friend

Goal: To battle your way through the futuristic building in order to save your friend. Good luck!

How to play:

Num 1- 3 are the different "tools" you can use

1 - regular blaster

2 - laser

3- Teleport(click on red floor tile).

MOBILE: IT IS SO HARD, I do not recommend playing on mobile play on PC if you can for the best experience. It works great but teleport does not work on this platform so gameplay is limited(And harder).
